title: Hold an Audit Closing Meeting
description: The audit team holds a closing meeting with business unit management to discuss the audit findings before the final report is issued.

tasks.description: Schedule the closing meeting with the auditee's leadership team.
Prepare a presentation deck summarizing the audit scope, key findings, and recommendations.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear and concise presentation is created.

tasks.description: During the meeting, present the findings and facilitate a discussion to ensure management understands the issues and agrees on the facts.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audit team and auditee are aligned on the findings, preventing disputes later.
